::Battera:;

She felt her face flush and she turned away from him.
"I..ah..I deal with communications. Well, used to. Now I'm an 
ambassador for the peace talks."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm grins at Battera. "What do you think I do, beautiful?" he 
asks her, 
> pointing to his arm cannon, "I either slag bots outside or controll 
the 
> weapon systems manually from in here."
> 
> He smiles at her. "Its an exciting job. What does a cute bot like 
you do at 
> your base, though?" he asks, a bit curious.
